What we do?


At M19-Material Intelligence lab, we're assisting various technical textile manufacturers,
to help them ensure high- quality fabric products are being engineered by providing access
to advanced textile performance testing products, and lab testing services.

R&D Solutions


At M19 Lab, we understand that technical textile manufacturers are faced with increasingly complex issues,
from increasing regulatory compliances, competitive market positioning, to improving efficiency,
performance sustainability, and profits. Becoming a technology partner helps you meet these challenges
head-on by deploying our custom-designed technical textile lab products.

PRODUCTS

Surface Area Analyzer

Pore Size Distribution of filter products directly affects its filtration efficiency and pressure differential. M19 lab offers ASTM-based Micropore Analyzers for analyzing pore sizes of filter media. The Micropore & Nanopore Analyzer instrument can be deployed for ultra-high precision measurement of The pore size distribution of filter media up to 10 nanometers in size.
ASTM F316, ASTM D6767


✖

Request a Quote

Pore Size Distribution of filter products directly affects its filtration efficiency and pressure differential. M19 lab offers ASTM-based Micropore Analyzers for analyzing pore sizes of filter media. MicroPore Analyzer

Pore Size Distribution of filter products directly affects its filtration efficiency and pressure differential. M19 lab offers ASTM-based Micropore Analyzers for analyzing pore sizes of filter media. The Micropore & Nanopore Analyzer instrument can be deployed for ultra-high precision measurement of The pore size distribution of filter media up to 10 nanometers in size.
ASTM F316, ASTM D6767

Request a Quote

APPLICATION

Air/Water/ Oil Filters

Ultra-high precision testing throughout all mechanical, absorption, sequestration filter applications. All kinds of filters used in separation sciences across microporous, microporous & nanopores are covered at the M19 lab.

RO/ UF Membrane Filters

Reverse osmosis filters systems are some of the strongest, most effective filters for drinking water. M19 lab analyses high-performance membranes that remove 99% of the most dangerous contaminants in the water, including heavy metals, pesticides, chlorine, or other chemicals.

Cartridge Filters

Ultra-high precision testing throughout all pleated, membrane-based, metallic mesh, sintered metal type of cartridge filters. All kinds of cartridge filters used in separation sciences across microporous, microporous & nanopores are covered at the M19 lab.
